issue.title: [CF 862] Stacks of "Bastion of Glory"
issue.body:
What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

When I set the Tellmewhen to display stacks of Bastion of Glory, it shows the percentage increase of the "Word of Glory/Eternal Flame" heal, instead of the tracking the number of stacks (I.E. The number of times I've cast Shield of the Righteousness.) of "Bastion of Glory"

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.2.5

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No this is not an Error, but a "Quality of Life" Change

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

I do not have any strings, but the spell ID is correct for BoG, I just ask that the smaller more manageable number be displayed


> Posted by CurseForge user Sailor_Jimmy | Imported from CurseForge issue #862 | Raw

comments.body:
You should have posted the export string of the icon that you are having trouble with as I requested.

That said, the problem is most likely that you have the "show variable text" option enabled on the icon. Disable that option and you will be good to go.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
